version.description: Internal parameter to keep track of the version of the file

disableBaseDamage.description: Damage from structures built through base-building

disableContainerDamage.description: Disable damage from items such as tents and barrels

disableRespawnDialog.description: Disable a UI dialogue window in which the player selects the type of respawn they wish to perform after pressing the respawn button

disableRespawnInUnconsciousness.description: Disables the 'Respawn' button available in the pause menu (Esc) when the player is unconscious, disallowing them to respawn

disablePersonalLight.description: Disables the omnipresent personal light lighting up objects close to player during night-time

sprintStaminaModifierErc.description: Modifies the rate at which the stamina is being consumed during erected sprint

sprintStaminaModifierCro.description: Modifies the rate at which the stamina is being consumed during crouched sprint

staminaWeightLimitThreshold.description: This amount of stamina points (divided by 1000) will not count towards stamina weight deduction

staminaMax.description: Maximum stamina (setting to 0 may produce unexpected results)

staminaKgToStaminaPercentPenalty.description: Multiplier used when calculating stamina points deducted from max stamina given the player load

staminaMinCap.description: Minimum size of stamina cap (setting to 0 may produce unexpected results)

sprintSwimmingStaminaModifier.description: Modifies the rate at which the stamina is being consumed during fast swimming

sprintLadderStaminaModifier.description: Modifies the rate at which the stamina is being consumed during fast ladder climbing

meleeStaminaModifier.description: Modifies how much stamina is being consumed when performing heavy melee attacks and evasion

obstacleTraversalStaminaModifier.description: Modifies how much stamina is being consumed when performing jumping, climbing and vaulting

holdBreathStaminaModifier.description: Modifies the rate at which the stamina is being consumed when holding breath

shockRefillSpeedConscious.description: Shock value recovery while the player is conscious (per second)

shockRefillSpeedUnconscious.description: Shock value recovery while the player is unconscious (per second)

allowRefillSpeedModifier.description: Allow/disallow modifier of Shock value recovery based on ammo type settings (typically faster waking-up from uncon after getting shot)

timeToStrafeJog.description: Time to blend strafing (diagonal movement) while jogging

rotationSpeedJog.description: Rotation speed of the character while jogging

timeToSprint.description: Time to reach sprint from jog

timeToStrafeSprint.description: Time to blend strafing (diagonal movement) while sprinting

rotationSpeedSprint.description: Rotation speed of the character while sprinting

allowStaminaAffectInertia.description: When enabled allows stamina value influence player's inertia

staminaDepletionSpeed.description: Stamina depleted per second while drowning

healthDepletionSpeed.description: Health depleted per second while drowning

shockDepletionSpeed.description: Shock depleted per second while drowning

spawnGearPresetFiles.description: If not empty, enables loading and processing of Player Gear Spawn JSON configuration file(s)

lightingConfig.description: What type of lighting will be used during night time (0 = bright, 1 = dark)

objectSpawnersArr.description: File names of the JSON files containing spawner data

environmentMinTemps.description: List of minimal temperatures (12 values exactly)

environmentMaxTemps.description: List of maximal temperatures (12 values exactly)

wetnessWeightModifiers.description: Values for item weight modification based on wetness level of the item. Values from left to right: [DRY, DAMP, WET, SOAKED, DRENCHED]

disableIsCollidingBBoxCheck.description: Allows placement when the hologram is colliding with objects in the world

disableIsCollidingPlayerCheck.description: Allows placement when the hologram is colliding with player

disableIsClippingRoofCheck.description: Allows placement where placing would cause clipping with the roof

disableIsBaseViableCheck.description: Allows placement on dynamic objects and other otherwise incompatible base

disableIsCollidingGPlotCheck.description: Allows placement of garden plots despite incompatible surface type

disableIsCollidingAngleCheck.description: Allows placement despite exceeding roll/pitch/yaw limits

disableIsPlacementPermittedCheck.description: Allows placement event when not permitted by rudimentary checks

disableHeightPlacementCheck.description: Allows placement with limited height space

disableIsInTerrainCheck.description: Allows placement when clipping with terrain

disableColdAreaPlacementCheck.description: Allows placement of garden plots when the ground is frozen.

disallowedTypesInUnderground.description: Prevents construction of these items types (including inherited ones) in the underground areas

disablePerformRoofCheck.description: Allows construction when clipping with the roof

disableIsCollidingCheck.description: Allows construction when colliding with objects in the world

disableDistanceCheck.description: Prevents construction when player gets bellow specified range

use3DMap.description: Enables use of the 3D map only (disables the default 2d map overlay)

hitDirectionOverrideEnabled.description: Decides whether the values get used or not. Since anything undefined in the 'HitIndicationData' class (or any class in json file) is considered zero, allows us to determine that some valid data had been loaded.

hitDirectionBehaviour.description: Dictates general behaviour of the hit indicator. 0 == Disabled, 1 == Static, 2 == Dynamic (moving when displayed, WIP)

hitDirectionStyle.description: Dictates which type of indicator gets used. Set of images and position calculations. 0 == 'splash', 1 == 'spike', 2 == 'arrow'

hitDirectionIndicatorColorStr.description: Color of the indicator widget, in ARGB format. The color is written in string form

hitDirectionMaxDuration.description: Maximal duration of the hit indicator. Actual duration is between 0.6..1.0 of the defined value, depending on the severity of the hit (which generally means heavier hits == longer indication)

hitDirectionBreakPointRelative.description: Fraction of the actual duration, after which the indicator begins to recede (currently fade-out only), 0.0 = fades from the beginning, 0.5 == fades after 50% duration has elapsed, 1.0 == no fading

hitDirectionScatter.description: Amount of scatter to induce inaccuracy to the indication. Actual scatter is randomized by the amount of degrees in both directions (± value, so value of 10 gives a potential scatter of 20°)

hitIndicationPostProcessEnabled.description: Allows for disabling of the old hit effect (red flash)

ignoreMapOwnership.description: Player can open a map (and just the map) using dedicated input ('M') even without map in player's inventory.

ignoreNavItemsOwnership.description: Compass and/or GPS receiver are not needed for displaying helpers on the 2D map.

displayPlayerPosition.description: Shows the red maker on the map, on player's position. It also display direction on the marker.

displayNavInfo.description: Hide GPS and Compass UI from the map legend completely (even when player has those items in inventory).
